Package com.epimorphics.lda.restlets

The restlets package contains those classes which interact with the web container in which Elda is embedded.

ShowCache  
ShowStats The ShowStats restlet provides access to an HTML rendering of Elda's StatsValues.
 

Package com.epimorphics.lda.restlets Description

The restlets package contains those classes which interact with the web container in which Elda is embedded. This should be the only place that is Jersey (ie JAX-RS) dependant.
